statements: DELETE FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE name = 'Sample Entry';
DELETE FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE id = 100 AND name = 'Example 1';
DELETE FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE name = 'Example 2' AND id = 200;
DELETE FROM SpatialData2 WHERE country = 'Spain' AND city = 'Barcelona'
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE result_value > 50 AND spatial_id IN (SELECT id FROM spatial_data WHERE data_source = 'sensor#1');
DELETE FROM spatial_data_1 WHERE latitude = 40.7128 AND longitude = -74.0060;
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE score > 0.8 AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
